price: 51.Nabii Mucammadow ﷺ Nabii Ibraahim qibinih (malayka Kinnuk) xaagu kccnih waris, Yalli Nabii Ibraahim baxa gcyuwaamih ayti kumaa kee Nabii Luut marih baysah ken ruube waqdi.

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
